duties_responsibilities.duty: Primary support for Raiser’s Edge (RE) donor database and support to regional fundraising teams in all matters of development related to the database.
Manages the daily operations and maintenance of the Raiser’s Edge database management system.
Maintain and modify data entry procedures to ensure data quality and keep data as current as possible.
Design complex queries, import and export data, create and run reports, and exhibit excellent Excel data manipulation skills.
Investigates and resolves matters of significance on behalf of management with respect to the Foundation system-wide database.
Responsible for training staff in the use of Raiser’s Edge and other fundraising software programs.
Responsible for special projects, organizes and follows through to completion as requested.
Provides expert advice and serves as the subject matter expert for the Foundation Database system wide.
Assist with donor census and wealth screening processes.
Assist with creation, review, and analysis of portfolios and related metrics and dashboards.
Prepare and reconcile annual donor recognition levels and assist with donor wall updates, including planned giving commitment donors.

education_certification.credential: High school education required. Two-Year College degree or comparable work experience in accounting and/or database management required. Bachelor’s Degree preferred.
